definition: variant of 黑糊糊[hei1 hu1 hu1]
abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]
(classical particle similar to 於|于[yu2]) in/at/from/because/than/(classical final particle similar to 嗎|吗[ma5], 吧[ba5], 呢[ne5], expressing question, doubt or astonishment)
(classical particle similar to 於|于[yu2]) in/at/from/because/than/(classical final particle similar to 嗎|吗[ma5], 吧[ba5], 呢[ne5], expressing question, doubt or astonishment)

sentences.english: Looking at the black bottom of the ditch, his son felt dizzy.
sentences.chinese: 兒子看了看黑乎乎的溝底，立即傻了眼。

sentences.english: Most days, they would emerge, sweaty and dirty and dusted with coal.
sentences.chinese: 大多時候，他們髒兮兮地黑乎乎的帶着煤出來。

sentences.english: Jim and his gang hid in the dark behind these stairs.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆和他那一夥都藏在扶梯後面黑乎乎的地方。

sentences.english: The black water swirled around his legs, reaching almost to his knees…
sentences.chinese: 黑乎乎的髒水在他腿邊打着旋，幾乎快要沒到了膝蓋。

sentences.english: It is dark and body, and very, very small, so are not easily found.
sentences.chinese: 它全身黑乎乎的，很小很小，所以不容易被人發現。

sentences.english: I can't see anything in this dark room.
sentences.chinese: 這房間裏黑乎乎的，我什麼也看不見。

sentences.english: Gambling shavings back home, see the home of the dark.
sentences.chinese: 奕茹回去家，看到家裏黑乎乎的。

definition: variant of 黑糊糊[hei1 hu1 hu1]
variant of 黑糊糊[hei1 hu1 hu1]
see 灰不溜丟|灰不溜丢[hui1 bu5 liu1 diu1]
pitch-black/(fig.) to be completely in the dark
